name: MarketExtended
description: This contract is contains a set of non-core functions for the MarketTieredLeverage contract that are not important enough to be included in the core contract. This contract should ONLY have view/pure functions, else it risks causing bugs that may interfere with the 'core' contract functions.

eventDecorators.name: AdminChanged
eventDecorators.description: Transmits the address of the donor and the amount donated.

eventDecorators.name: BeaconUpgraded
eventDecorators.description: Transmits the address of the donor and the amount donated.

eventDecorators.name: ConfigChange
eventDecorators.description: Transmits the address of the donor and the amount donated.

eventDecorators.name: Initialized
eventDecorators.description: Transmits the address of the donor and the amount donated.

eventDecorators.name: MintingPauseChange
eventDecorators.description: Transmits the address of the donor and the amount donated.

eventDecorators.name: RoleAdminChanged

eventDecorators.name: RoleGranted
eventDecorators.description: Transmits the address of the donor and the amount donated.

eventDecorators.name: RoleRevoked
eventDecorators.description: Transmits the address of the donor and the amount donated.

eventDecorators.name: SeparateMarketLaunchedAndSeeded

functionDecorators.name: addPoolToExistingMarket
functionDecorators.description: TODO pack the parameters into a struct in future to be aligned with initializePools function above.Add a pool to an existing market. Can only be called by the current admin.

parameterDecorators.name: initPool
parameterDecorators.description: initialization info for the new pool.

parameterDecorators.name: initialEffectiveLiquidityForNewPool
parameterDecorators.description: initial effective liquidity to be added to new pool at initialization.

parameterDecorators.name: seederAndAdmin
parameterDecorators.description: address of pool seeder and admin.

parameterDecorators.name: _marketIndex
parameterDecorators.description: index of the market.

parameterDecorators.name: _yieldManager
parameterDecorators.description: address of the yield manager.

returnDecorators.name: poolInitializationSuccess
returnDecorators.description: bool value indicating whether pool addition was successful.

functionDecorators.name: changeMarketFundingRateMultiplier
functionDecorators.description: Update the yearly funding rate multiplier for the market. Can only be called by the current admin.

parameterDecorators.name: _fundingRateMultiplier_e18
parameterDecorators.description: New funding rate multiplier.

functionDecorators.name: getMiaAddress
functionDecorators.description: Purely a convenience function to get the synthetic token address. Used in testing.

functionDecorators.name: getNumberOfPools
functionDecorators.description: Returns the number of pools of poolType i.e. Long or Short.

parameterDecorators.name: isLong
parameterDecorators.description: true for long, false for short.

functionDecorators.name: getRoleAdmin
functionDecorators.description: Returns the admin role that controls `role`. See {grantRole} and {revokeRole}. To change a role's admin, use {_setRoleAdmin}.

functionDecorators.name: get_even_batched_amountPaymentToken_deposit
functionDecorators.description: Returns batched deposit amount in payment token for even numbered epochs.

parameterDecorators.name: poolType
parameterDecorators.description: indicates either Long or Short pool type.

parameterDecorators.name: pool
parameterDecorators.description: index of the pool on the market side.

functionDecorators.name: get_even_batched_amountSyntheticToken_redeem
functionDecorators.description: Returns batched redeem amount in synthetic token for even numbered epochs.

parameterDecorators.name: poolType
parameterDecorators.description: indicates either Long or Short pool type.

parameterDecorators.name: pool
parameterDecorators.description: index of the pool on the market side.

functionDecorators.name: get_odd_batched_amountPaymentToken_deposit
functionDecorators.description: Returns batched deposit amount in payment token for odd numbered epochs.

parameterDecorators.name: poolType
parameterDecorators.description: indicates either Long or Short pool type.

parameterDecorators.name: pool
parameterDecorators.description: index of the pool on the market side.

functionDecorators.name: get_odd_batched_amountSyntheticToken_redeem
functionDecorators.description: Returns batched redeem amount in synthetic token for odd numbered epochs.

parameterDecorators.name: poolType
parameterDecorators.description: indicates either Long or Short pool type.

parameterDecorators.name: pool
parameterDecorators.description: index of the pool on the market side.

functionDecorators.name: get_pool_leverage
functionDecorators.description: Returns the leverage of the pool.

parameterDecorators.name: poolType
parameterDecorators.description: indicates either Long or Short pool type.

parameterDecorators.name: pool
parameterDecorators.description: index of the pool on the market side.

functionDecorators.name: get_pool_value
functionDecorators.description: Returns value of the pool in payment token.

parameterDecorators.name: poolType
parameterDecorators.description: indicates either Long or Short pool type.

parameterDecorators.name: pool
parameterDecorators.description: index of the pool on the market side.

functionDecorators.name: get_total_value_realized_in_market
functionDecorators.description: Returns the total liquidity in the market.

returnDecorators.name: totalValueRealizedInMarket
returnDecorators.description: total liquidity in all pools on both sides.

functionDecorators.name: grantRole
functionDecorators.description: Grants `role` to `account`. If `account` had not been already granted `role`, emits a {RoleGranted} event. Requirements: - the caller must have ``role``'s admin role. May emit a {RoleGranted} event.

functionDecorators.name: hasRole
functionDecorators.description: Returns `true` if `account` has been granted `role`.

functionDecorators.name: proxiableUUID
functionDecorators.description: Implementation of the ERC1822 {proxiableUUID} function. This returns the storage slot used by the implementation. It is used to validate that the this implementation remains valid after an upgrade. IMPORTANT: A proxy pointing at a proxiable contract should not be considered proxiable itself, because this risks bricking a proxy that upgrades to it, by delegating to itself until out of gas. Thus it is critical that this function revert if invoked through a proxy. This is guaranteed by the `notDelegated` modifier.

functionDecorators.name: renounceRole
functionDecorators.description: Revokes `role` from the calling account. Roles are often managed via {grantRole} and {revokeRole}: this function's purpose is to provide a mechanism for accounts to lose their privileges if they are compromised (such as when a trusted device is misplaced). If the calling account had been revoked `role`, emits a {RoleRevoked} event. Requirements: - the caller must be `account`. May emit a {RoleRevoked} event.

functionDecorators.name: revokeRole
functionDecorators.description: Revokes `role` from `account`. If `account` had been granted `role`, emits a {RoleRevoked} event. Requirements: - the caller must have ``role``'s admin role. May emit a {RoleRevoked} event.

functionDecorators.name: supportsInterface
functionDecorators.description: See {IERC165-supportsInterface}.

functionDecorators.name: updateMarketOracle
functionDecorators.description: Update oracle for a market. Can only be called by the current admin.

parameterDecorators.name: _newOracleManager
parameterDecorators.description: Address of the replacement oracle manager.

functionDecorators.name: upgradeTo
functionDecorators.description: Upgrade the implementation of the proxy to `newImplementation`. Calls {_authorizeUpgrade}. Emits an {Upgraded} event.

functionDecorators.name: upgradeToAndCall
functionDecorators.description: Upgrade the implementation of the proxy to `newImplementation`, and subsequently execute the function call encoded in `data`. Calls {_authorizeUpgrade}. Emits an {Upgraded} event.
